name: Caden's Climb
description:
Caden's Climb is a fast-paced platformer inspired by Pizza Tower & the WarioLand series (emphasis on "inspired by Pizza Tower") where you play as Caden Climb, the indie developer on a quest to stop the big fish company, Super Silly Softwares from absolutely destroying your game company while making sure to rescue all 5 smalls from each level.

In Caden's Climb, you can expect a variety of ways to play such as,
  • Classic Mode: Get to the end of the level, then backtrack your way to the beginning.
  • Race Mode: Compete against your friend (and pastaria owner) Caden Smalls.
  • Death Run: Battle against a running clock to stop your points from draining. Collect clocks to reset the timer, run out of points and you're done for.
  • Hide & Seek: Find and collect each Small in the level before time runs out. If time runs out, you'll be greeted with a surprise.
  • Genocide: Destroy every enemy in your sight. Let none of them free.
  • Boss Mode: Fight a boss, and try not get hurt too much!
  • And more to be added in the future!


We've also got a banger soundtrack composed mostly by this gloobert.
